tool_description: Manages notification of relevant stakeholders about workplace incidents including supervisors, HR, safety officers, and regulatory bodies based on incident type and severity.

incident_id.description: Unique identifier of the incident report

incident_severity.description: Severity level: low, medium, high, critical

regulatory_notification_required.description: Whether regulatory bodies need to be notified

error_messages: Invalid incident ID: Provide a valid incident_id that exists in the system.
Invalid severity level: Use one of [low, medium, high, critical].
Missing supervisor contacts: At least one supervisor contact is required.
Invalid contact format: Ensure all contacts are valid email addresses or phone numbers.
Invalid notification priority: Use one of [immediate, urgent, routine].
Regulatory notification conflict: Critical incidents automatically require regulatory notification.
usage: Provide incident_id, incident_severity, and supervisor_contacts. Include HR and safety officer contacts as needed. Set regulatory_notification_required for reportable incidents and appropriate notification_priority.

notification_id.description: Unique identifier for this notification batch
